frame.name: Clothing
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame refers to clothing and its characteristics, including anything that people conventionally wear. The <fen>Wearer</fen> wears a <fen>Garment</fen> that has a certain <fen>Style</fen>, is made of a certain <fen>Material</fen>, and can be otherwise characterized by a <fen>Descriptor</fen>. In some cases, the <fen>Body_location</fen> (where the garment is worn) and <fen>Subregion</fen> of the clothing may also be specified.
<ex>Claudia dressed in a <fex name="Descriptor">dark</fex> <fex name="Descriptor">green</fex> <fex name="Material">cotton</fex> <t>DRESS</t> clasped round her slender waist with a broad yellow belt , drank a cup of coffee and opened her neglected post .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Garment
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifes the clothing worn.
<ex>Mike wore a new leather <fex name="Garment">jacket</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Wearer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Wearer</fen> is the person wearing the clothes, or for whom the clothes are intended.
<ex><fex name="Wearer">Mike</fex> wore a new leather jacket.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Style
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifes the design, or cut, of the clothing.
<ex>Mike wore a <fex name="Style">tailored</fex> leather <t>jacket</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifes the material from which the clothing is made.
<ex>Mike wore a new <fex name="Material">leather</fex> jacket.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifes any description of the clothing besides <fen>Style</fen> and <fen>Material</fen>. <ex>Mike wore a <fex name="Descriptor">new</fex> <fex name="Descriptor">black</fex> leather <t>jacket</t>.</ex> Note that each modifer of the target gets its own FE (and, hence, its own GF and PT).</def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies a part of the clothing.
<ex>Mike wore a leather jacket <fex name="Subregion">with fringes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifes the <fen>Use</fen> for which a <fen>Garment</fen> is worn or was made.
<ex>Mike wore a new <fex name="Use">riding</fex> jacket.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Body_location
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Body_location</fen> identifies the place on the body where the clothing is worn.
<ex>Hannah draped a shawl elegantly <fex name="Body_loc">over her shoulders</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual who created the <fen>Garment</fen>.
<ex>She 's wearing a <fex name="cre">Ralph Lauren</fex> <t>dress</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which the <fen>Creator</fen> makes the <fen>Garment</fen>.
<ex>The <t>bikinis</t> <fex name="tim">of the 1940's</fex> are fairly similar.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>The name given to a specific <fen>Garment</fen>. Note this is not the name of a general class of clothing items, but rather an individual item. This is accordingly VERY RARE.
<ex></ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: blouse.n
lexUnit.definition: voor het bovenlichaam van dunne stof met knoopsluiting en een boord

lexUnit.name: kleren.n
lexUnit.definition: zoals jassen, broeken, truien, jurken etc.

lexUnit.name: sjaal.n
lexUnit.definition: voor om je hals, om je hals warm te houden of voor de sier

lexUnit.name: panty.n
lexUnit.definition: dat bestaat uit nylon kousen en broekje aan één stuk

lexUnit.name: jarretel.n
lexUnit.definition: voor om het middel van vrouwen met bandjes en klemmetjes om kousen mee vast te zetten bij het dragen

lexUnit.name: anorak.n
lexUnit.definition: met capuchon, dat men over het hoofd aan moet trekken

lexUnit.name: kimono.n
lexUnit.definition: met wijde mouwen die sluit met een band of koord

lexUnit.name: uniform.n
lexUnit.definition: die geijkt is, of dracht die bedoeld is voor een bepaalde categorie van personen (bijv. militairen, politieagenten e.d.)

lexUnit.name: gelijk.n
lexUnit.definition: van het billijk of rechtvaardig zijn

lexUnit.name: kazuifel.n
lexUnit.definition: van een priester tijdens de mis
